page.title: 11Tenbury Market 2
page.content: No animal has ever{escaped}from the market on to the road but they have escaped on to the car park. Tenbury Market doesn't sell wool because it is illegal,the wool is sold at{Bromyard Wool Marketing Board. Tenbury has been altered and is the first market in the{West Midlands}to have a Cattle weighbridge,a built in selling ring and the pens renewed and they have had a new fruit selling ring recently. Mr.Bufton the{auctioneer}likes his job because it is very involved with the public and he likes shouting away like mad.There are ten full time staff workers and on market days eight or ten part time workers.Tenbury Market had a fire about fifteen years ago in the fruit selling days.
